Desc.entry: Group for carers of children with special needs which allows parents and their children to meet and socialise with each other. Also provides full respite facilities, parents may leave their special needs children and any siblings between 10am and 3pm every Saturday during term-time. Suitable for children aged 5-13 years. Self or any referral.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sat 10am-3pm (term-time only), Mon-Fri (school holidays, please contact for further details)
